title: Jones Says H&R Block Built for Times Like These
itunes:title: Jones Says H&R Block Built for Times Like These
description:
Jeff Jones, CEO of H&R Block, discusses earnings and the impact of inflation on the consumer. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa share the details of Annie's Businessweek Magazine story NYC Exodus Brings Joy and Agony for AllianceBernstein’s Staff. Bloomberg News Crypto Reporter Olga Kharif discusses Coinbase tumbling to record lows as a crypto meltdown deepens. And we Drive to the Close with Austin Graff, Portfolio Manager at TrueMark Investments.Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Jeff Jones, CEO of H&R Block, discusses earnings and the impact of inflation on the consumer. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa share the details of Annie's Businessweek Magazine story NYC Exodus Brings Joy and Agony for AllianceBernstein’s Staff. Bloomberg News Crypto Reporter Olga Kharif discusses Coinbase tumbling to record lows as a crypto meltdown deepens. And we Drive to the Close with Austin Graff, Portfolio Manager at TrueMark Investments.Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
